pages.title: About me
pages.text: Software developer currently based in Edinburgh, Scotland. Passionate developer that believes in bringing ideas to life through creative UI, fast website with great SEO and fantastic user journeys to give the best customer experience.

pages.title: Recent experience
pages.text: I am currently working with a small start up software consultancy firm based in Edinburgh. Through is I have worked on many different projects. To deliver fast and effective solutions.

pages.title: My Passions
pages.text: Growing up in the Highlands of Scotland. I was always by actives. I became an outdoor instructor and had the opportunity to teach all over the EU One of my favorite pass times is getting out on the water or up on the mountains.
